com.ocean927.memory.client

Interface MemoryManagement

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MemoryClientInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMemoryManagerAlgorithm, OffHeapMemoryMgrImpl, OnHeapMemoryMgrImpl

    public interface MemoryManagement
    The Interface MemoryManagement.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long allocate(long requestedLength)
      Allocate block of memory.
      int deallocate(long address)
      Deallocate block of memory back to the common pool.
      void defragment()
      Defragment scans entire memory and combines adjacent free blocks into bigger blocks.
      void freeMemory()
      Free memory by telling the underlining implementation to give it up back to OS.
      void setup(long memorySizeBytes, int pageSizeParam)
      Set up memory and page size.

      Set up memory using default page 1K.

      Set up memory and page size, passing string arguments.

       throws MemoryManagerException
        Allocate block of memory. Similar to C malloc.

        requestedLength - the requested length
        Returns:
        the long
        Throws:
        MemoryManagerException - the memory manager exception

      • deallocate

        int deallocate(long address)
        throws MemoryManagerException
        Deallocate block of memory back to the common pool.
        Parameters:
        address - the address
        Returns:
        the int
        Throws:
        MemoryManagerException - the memory manager exception

      • defragment

        void defragment()
         throws MemoryManagerException
        Defragment scans entire memory and combines adjacent free blocks into bigger blocks. It helps to service large allocation requests. Note, the method can move used memory block to a different location even though it might create larger contiguous free space.
        Throws:
        MemoryManagerException - the memory manager exception

      • freeMemory

        void freeMemory()
         throws MemoryManagerException
        Free memory by telling the underlining implementation to give it up back to OS.
        Throws:
        MemoryManagerException - the memory manager exception
